phrases: I meant for you to hide here.
If I do not forget, I will come back and dig you out.
A ghost appeared from inside the well...
As the legend of our shrine goes...
There is something in the bone-devouring well
that takes the corpses of evil spirits
And if this somewhereis in the time dimension...
With written oracles to ward off evil spirits
and seal off the entry to the netherworld.
The well will never be opened again.
No mistaking the smell of that girl...
It is like it never happened...
that I was in another age and another time.
You must combine your powers with Inuyasha
and gather the fragments of the Sacred Jewel and restore it.
The Sacred Jewel is in pieces.
That Yura with the inverted hair...
She must have been after the Jewel, too.
I will bet Inuyasha would be so angry
if he learned that the fragment was stolen from me.
I prefer to go it alone!
All right, I will forget him.
Besides, I can never return to that world again.
Kagome, Yuka is on the phone.
Will the seals on the well ever come off?
Each seal contains powerful words of magic that cannot be broken.
No matter what kind of evil spirit, it will be impossible.
It is a hot pot for dinner!
- So you can rest assured, Kagome. - Hot pot!
It is such a glorious age!
Who said you can go home?!
Those oracles have been used of this shrine since ancient times...
You mean, this flimsy piece of paper?
I do not want to go!
Mom, this is no time for that...
Although I did the same thing.
But being able to see is not enough.
You have the vision at least.
You brought something awful with you!!
Here... I must stop it right here!
It gathers together again, even when it is cut.
There is no end to this!
The main strand that is controlling everything.
If Yura was after the Sacred Jewel...
Could she actually be after me and Inuyasha?
That was a quick change of mind.
I do not really want to go.
But if I stay here, Gramps, Mom and even Sota...
This was woven with the fur of the Fire Rat.
It is much stronger than an ordinary armor.
You look like you have really weird skin.
This time, I will give them a big reception...
Kagome is my sister Kikyo's reincarnation.
However, she is not aware yet of the scope of her powers.
She needs your help right now.
There is hair all over the well, too!
Are you saying that this Yura with the combed Hair is after us
Look, she took the Sacred Jewel fragment...
yet she still comes after us!
Did you say she took it?!
I can see several glowing strands of hair there...
There is the main strand that is been bewitching the others.
That means if we follow the main strand, we will find Yura!
There is no time to stand around and quarrel!
You need Kagome and Kagome needs you!
And you must get through this difficulty together!
They must have gotten tangled in the hair strands.
And do not start whining about wanting to go home.
We must destroy Yura quickly or many innocent people will die.
The arrows you shoot probably will not hit their targets.
She is hopeless, but I got to admit, she is gutsy.
Use your instincts to evade them!
I thought you came to fight?!
You are Inuyasha, are not you?
I heard the gossip in the wind.
That a half-demon named Inuyasha is serving...
the reincarnation of a shrine maiden...
and helping her to protect for the Sacred Jewel.
You have got to be kidding me!
Well, both of you are brainless.
Turning the Sacred Jewel into this.
That is the Jewel fragment she stole from me!
In any case, I will deal with you two...
and go look for the other fragments.
You are the one who will rue the day...
The same tactic over and over again!
But you have not taken care of it, have you?
Now, I will shred you to pieces!
Now, I will shred you to pieces!
Because I will not miss this time!
The woman who disappeared from the well?
You two must be quite chummy!
It is not that pretty, but I think I will take her hair, too.
The heads of those fallen warriors we saw...
Your head will soon occupy a place there.
I cannot wait to control it.
How do you like my demon fire!
You will feel the heat all the way to your bones!
You are being punished for messing with my nest!
That woman... she will be left with no bones.
Well, you will be joining her in no time, too.
Now you cannot control your strands!
You should treat ladies more gently.
People will laugh at you, you know?
You are just a half-demon with half the power.
You wanted this in order to become a full-fledged demon, huh?
I have to sever your head very carefully...
so that blood will not stain those silver locks.
Thrusting your hand into the breasts...
of a woman you have only just met.
You stole my Jewel fragment, did not you?
Now that was not nice at all.
You should not have looked away!
You did not bat an eyelid when you were struck or hurt.
There is something inside that...that red skull!
If it hurts you, let go.
Is it because of this robe?
It is an armor made from the fur of the Fire Rat.
It is much stronger than ordinary metal.
You seem like an ordinary mortal...
Do not you faint on me!
I cannot be looking after you!
The strand coming out of this red skull...
It is connected to Yura's hand!
So that is Yura's true form...
That is the Adornment Comb of the Dead.
It was used to comb the hair of the dead...
that is how it probably got bewitched.
In this day and age, an enchanted comb or two...
is nothing to be surprised at.
Because you let me wear your Fire Rat armor.
I wonder how long it will take to accumulate them all?
It is the first time you said my name.
Maybe you have decided to be a bit nicer to me?
Who would be chums with a girl like you?!
And who was it that just saved you?
Look... if it hurts, just speak up and say so!
And hurry up and remember that you buried me!
I was saved by the Fire Rat robe thanks to Inuyasha...
That reminds me of a story of Princess Kaguya from the Tale of Taketori.
She did not want to get married so she gave away the Fire Rat robe instead.
So that robe was from the demon world.
And now the phantom sword Tetsusaiga?!
Battle begins between two brothers for the possession of the sword.
Next time, Inuyasha Aristocratic Assassin, Sesshomaru
